alert.note: Alert for Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:45PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WINONA AND SOUTHWESTERN TREMPEALEAU COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Trempealeau to 7 miles southeast of Stockton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Trempealeau around 750 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wilson, Witoka, Ridgeway, Pickwick, Perrot State Park and Lock And Dam 6. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 251 and 263. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
